name: 2 Frame Gallery
description:
• A: Lower Sensitivity
  • S: Raise Sensitivity
  • R: Center Cursor
  • Left Click: Shoot

Targets flip every half a second and are untargetable when grey. Shooting has three quarters of a second cooldown.

This game was made in 2 hours for Mini Jam #62, the limitation was only use 2 frame animations. I wanted my game mechanic to actually care about what frame the animation was on, that's why you can only shoot targets half of the time.
